sentences.english: Alex and Tony were turning awkward hands to plows and hoe handles.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯和托尼在犁耙等农活方面都几乎变成新手了。

sentences.english: I also don't see the animals being employed for ploughing, pulling or other menial work.
sentences.chinese: 我在中国农村没看到有动物在干犁田之类的农活。

sentences.english: I possibly even helped the children in the neighbourhood with their lessons.
sentences.chinese: 我帮他们干农活，扶助邻家的孩子温习功课。

sentences.english: If, in this Heavenly Stems of the farm, they are taboo.
sentences.chinese: 若在这天干了农活，就属于犯忌句号。

sentences.english: She can do every kind of farm work.
sentences.chinese: 样样农活她都拿得起来。

sentences.english: So I was afraid of doing farm work.
Now my family condition is getting better and all farm work is done by machines.
sentences.chinese: 现在，家境稍微好些，地里农活也是机械化了。

sentences.english: The stock farm is raising big horses for work in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 这个畜牧场在饲养干农活的高头大马。

sentences.english: He trained the horse to do farm work.
During busy seasons they help with field work.
sentences.chinese: 农忙季节他们帮助干农活。

sentences.english: He is always busy with his farm work.
Now farmers use tractors to do farm work instead of horses.
sentences.chinese: 现在农民使用拖拉机代替马干农活儿。

sentences.english: Therefore, the farm work at home is always done by my mother.
sentences.chinese: 所以家里的农活都由我的妈妈来料理。

sentences.english: I spent two weeks helping my grandfather do some farm work there.
sentences.chinese: 我花了两周帮我祖父做些农活。

sentences.english: Now farmers use tractors to take the place of horses.
sentences.chinese: 现在农民使用拖拉机代替马干农活儿。

sentences.english: He does not look strong, but he does all right in farm work.
sentences.chinese: 别看他身体不强，干起农活来可不善。

definition: erhua variant of 重活[zhong4 huo2]
to harrow/to break the ground with a hoe
erhua variant of 幹活|干活[gan4 huo2]
